item.title: Charlie Hunnam Unveils His Bone-Chilling Ed Gein in ‘Monster’ Teaser Trailer
item.description: The next season of Ryan Murphy and Ian Brennan’s horror anthology focuses on the infamous serial murderer and body snatcher.

item.title: ‘Scream Queens’ Co-Creator Muses About Reviving Horror Series, Talks Glen Powell’s Now “Movie Star” Fame
item.description: The Fox series ended in 2016 after two seasons, to which Ian Brennan says: “We had really good ideas for where it could go next,” including a Friday the 13th-like setting.
